onset.Description: Onset time of the event in seconds from recording start

duration.Description: Duration of the event in seconds

sample.Description: Sample index of the event onset (at 2048 Hz sampling rate)

trial_type.Description: Categorical event classification matching the value column

task_type.Description: Task phase type within a trial

Levels.dynamic: Dynamic movement from rest to gesture position (1s duration)
Levels.maintenance: Static hold of gesture position (4s duration)

task_index.Description: Task index within the trial: 1-3 for dynamic tasks, 1 for maintenance

gesture_id.Description: Gesture number (1-34) as defined in Table I of Jiang et al. 2021

gesture_name.Description: Human-readable gesture name from Table I of Jiang et al. 2021
